You can pre-define a tagging vocabulary: Terms from the tagging vocabulary are automatically suggested to users when they create new tags. However, users can still create their own custom tags. Optionally, fixed colors can be assigned to the vocabulary tags.
Add vocabulary terms below: Add terms to the vocabulary by pasting into the text field (one term per line).
open-join-info: With 'Open Join' switched on, any registered user can join your project without an invitation.
open-edit-info: With 'Open Edit' switched on, any member of your project can edit the default assignment.
status_message: Projects can be either Active or Locked. Locked projects are read only but still accessible by the project members. Locked Public Projects cannot be joined by new members. Only Organization Admins can Unlock a project once locked.
lock_warning_message: Once a project is locked, it will become read-only for all project members, including yourself. The project will still be accessible by all project members, but no new members can be added. Only an Organization Admin can undo this action.
unlock_message: When a project is unlocked, there will be no project administrators. Be sure to designate one on the Teams page.
